reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and great for holiday parties, describing it as flattering, with one mentioning it effectively hides tummy pooch after a big dinner. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising the fabric while others express concerns. Several customers note that the dress runs extremely small.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Awful
items.body: This dress, while cute in videos and pictures, is not cute! It is not sized right. I ordered my usual size and I couldn't even get it over my head. The description needs to say, size is not true to fit and you must not have an ounce of fat on you if you want to wear it and look okay. Read more
items.author: JG

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs very small
items.body: The dress runs extremely small. I couldn't barely get it past my shoulders before I knew it was not going to fit. Returning immediately Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little black dress
items.body: Super cute and comfy! Read more
items.author: MBW

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size
items.body: It was really loose on the bottom half, and wound the neck it was so tight I thought I was going to be choked out. It went well above the middle of my neck. But I still really like the dress it’s self. I’ll probably make some adjustments to make it fit better. I like the material a lot. It was a bit pricy for the material, it was too stretchy around the body but not enough in the neck area like I said. I thought it was gonna be a little thicker but I actually am happy it’s not too thick as it can be hot in a lot of places you go to in the winter. Read more
items.author: Elaine Swartwood

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Potentially cute: not for tall girls
items.body: This dress was cute but it was way too short on me. The torso was short and if I raised my arms, the dress was too short to wear in public. I am 5 foot 9 inches. Read more
items.author: Rebecca Place

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but the top material is basically athletic wear
items.body: This is a cute black dress and I love the style of it, but it is different than what I expected. The top of the dress feels like athletic wear, which isn't necessarily a bad thing, but it hugs every part of you and clings. I prefer my dresses more loose fitting, especially long-sleeved dresses (so I don't get hot), but this material traps the heat and fits tight, even though the sizing is correct. I could've gone up a size, but with this material, I'm afraid it would look strange if it was too baggy. Overall, it's a cute dress, but I get really hot in it and usually end up changing before I even leave the house. Read more
items.author: Rae

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, Flattering Dress
items.body: I love this dress. I got the size small, I’m 120 lbs and it fit perfectly. Looks expensive but it isn’t and hides the tummy pooch after a big dinner. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Amanda Harness

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Took too long
items.body: Took too long to get it and it was too small but is a pretty dress Read more
items.author: Minnigabby

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Apricot, Multicolor, Black and White, Black, Black B. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
